item.title: Book Reviews
item.description:
Books in the Attic

While cleaning up in the attic, I found about 50 nonfiction books that look very interesting:

My Plan

My plan is to read them all throughout 2026, and write about them on this blog. You can find a list of all of them here. Most of them are Christian-focused, which may not be of interest to you, but I hope writing about them will be somewhat interesting.

item.title: First
item.description:
Hello World!

Hello everyone, my name is Oren Lindsey. This is my first post on my new blog. Hopefully this will be a place where I post often.
